casebody.data:
No. 09-400. Vincent E. Staub, Petitioner v. Proctor Hospital. 562 U.S. 821, 131 S. Ct. 379,

178 L. Ed. 2d 14,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6386. October 4, 2010.

Motion of the Acting Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted. Motion of *15Chamber of Commerce of the United States of America for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae out of time granted.

Justice Kagan took no part in the consideration or decision of these motions.
